Detailed Description

This class summarizes trades occurring over a time period.

The TimeBarInfo class is used to pass open/high/low/close trade information for a given time period, including the current best bid/ask prices and sizes at the time the trade data was received.

One can subscribe to time bars from the real-time stream or replay time bars from a historical database.

See also:
TimeBarReplayInfo
REngine::subscribeTimeBar()
REngine::unsubscribeTimeBar()
REngine::replayTimeBars()
RCallbacks::TimeBar()
RCallbacks::TimeBarReplay()

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TimeBarInfo::TimeBarInfo (  ) 

This constructor initializes all of the members. The pData of each tsNCharcb is set to MNM_EMPTY_DATA_ITEM and the iDataLen of each tsNCharcb is set to MNM_EMPTY_DATA_ITEM_LEN. Integer members and double members are initialized to zero. Boolean members are set to false.

TimeBarInfo::~TimeBarInfo (  )  [virtual]

This destructor will not deallocate memory associated with internal pointers such as the pData of any tsNCharcbs.

Member Function Documentation

int TimeBarInfo::dump ( int *  aiCode  ) 

This routine will print the current values of the object to stdout.

Member Data Documentation

TimeBarInfo::bCloseBestAsk

This represents if there was a best ask at the time of the close trade of this time period.

TimeBarInfo::bCloseBestBid

This represents if there was a best bid at the time of the close trade of this time period.

TimeBarInfo::bOpenBestAsk

This represents if there was a best ask at the time of the open trade of this time period.

TimeBarInfo::bOpenBestBid

This represents if there was a best bid at the time of the open trade of this time period.

TimeBarInfo::dCloseBestAskPrice

This represents the best ask price at the time of the close trade of this time period.

TimeBarInfo::dCloseBestBidPrice

This represents the best bid price at the time of the close trade of this time period.

TimeBarInfo::dClosePrice

This represents the price of the last trade occurring within the time period.

TimeBarInfo::dHighPrice

This represents the high price of all trades occurring within the time period.

TimeBarInfo::dLowPrice

This represents the low price of all trades occurring within the time period.

TimeBarInfo::dOpenBestAskPrice

This represents the best ask price at the time of the open trade of this time period.

TimeBarInfo::dOpenBestBidPrice

This represents the best bid price at the time of the open trade of this time period.

TimeBarInfo::dOpenPrice

This represents the price of the first trade occurring within the time period.

TimeBarInfo::iCloseBestAskSize

This represents the best ask size at the time of the close trade of this time period.

TimeBarInfo::iCloseBestBidSize

This represents the best bid size at the time of the close trade of this time period.

TimeBarInfo::iCloseSize

This represents the size of the last trade occurring within the time period.

TimeBarInfo::iHighNumTrades

This represents the number of trades occurring at the high price within the time period.

TimeBarInfo::iHighVolume

This represents the volume which traded at the high trade within the time period.

TimeBarInfo::iLowNumTrades

This represents the number of trades occurring at the low price within the time period.

TimeBarInfo::iLowVolume

This represents the volume which traded at the low trade within the time period.

TimeBarInfo::iNumTrades

The number of trades occuring over the time period.

TimeBarInfo::iOpenBestAskSize

This represents the best ask size at the time of the open trade of this time period.

TimeBarInfo::iOpenBestBidSize

This represents the best bid size at the time of the open trade of this time period.

TimeBarInfo::iOpenSize

This represents the size of the first trade occurring within the time period.

TimeBarInfo::iPeriod

The period of the time bar.

TimeBarInfo::iSsboe

Identifies the second (in ssboe format) of the end of the time bar.

TimeBarInfo::iVolume

The total volume of all the trades occuring over the time period.

TimeBarInfo::pContext

The context value passed when calling REngine::subscribeTimeBar() or REngine::replayTimeBars() is returned in this variable.

TimeBarInfo::sExchange

The exchange corresponding to the time bar.

TimeBarInfo::sTicker

The symbol corresponding to the time bar.
